sentences.en: Notes of heliotrope flowers and vanilla - combine to create the warm floral base notes.
sentences.cn: 天芥草及云呢拿 - 混合为散发温暖花香的基调.

sentences.en: She put her nose luxuriously buried in heliotrope and tea roses.
sentences.cn: 她把自己的鼻子惬意地埋在天芥菜和庚申蔷薇花簇中。

sentences.en: So Laurie played and Jo listened, with her nose luxuriously buried in heliotrope and tea roses.
sentences.cn: 这样劳瑞便弹了起来.裘把自己的鼻子惬意地埋在无芥菜和庚申蔷薇花簇中倾听着.

words.tran_cn: [植]天芥菜属植物；向阳植物；淡紫色；[宝]鸡血石

trans.tran_en: a garden plant with nice-smelling pale purple flowers
